segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures a slice of everyday life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is so absorbed in drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the sink is overflowing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring out, puddling all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in it, oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me worry for her safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's climbing that stool to reach the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks thrilled, holding a plate for more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool's not stable at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is all expectant, hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a lovely garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's contrasting the indoor hazards so sharply.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing bad happens to them.
segments.speaker: PAR
